paragraphs.body: The photo of "Noah Ringer" on this page is a fake photo. This is common information, so I do not understand why it is on this page. Wikis are suppose to be a place of facts, not speculation, so this photo should be removed. 173.66.212.164 20:38, 16 May 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: First of all, AWESOME!!!!! Secondly, I think we should change the picture, now. Either that, or we may have just found a profile pic for the potential page "Aang (Movie)" Discuss? Puragus Talk 02:31, 22 May 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Hello, my name is CC333. I am leaving this message to bring to those wh oit concerns that it seems rather unproductive to be bickering about a silly picture. If you are patient enough, than the chances are that you will see the motion picture and see finally who is right. Really it does not matter, now does it. If you guys really actually cared enough to be looking up about this kid then you would be here to say how excited you are or sharing facts you have found out. By the way, if any of you have an account on imdb, then could you tell us whether are not it is worth it, because I just want to do it to see if they actually have contacting info. I am the same age as Noah and take Christian Karate. I would LOVE to meet him in person, but not a walk-by or a hey, or an auto-graph, but a really down to earth talk. Maybe about his expirences on set and how he feels about the whole thing. It would be like a child reporter thing. I wonder how I could get in. Any ideas?

paragraphs.body: The RUMOR section is entirely inappropriate. There's nothing to indicate that Noah Ringer has any sort of Asian heritage at all. Until you can find an actual source, this needs to come down.

paragraphs.body: I checked in the Behind the Voice Actors's page for The Last Airbender video game, and it states Noah voiced Aang there, but I don't know if it's true... Superior Spider-Man (wall • contribs) 06:44, September 21, 2013 (UTC)
